name: Mergedom: Home Design
description:
Get ready for a brand new and exciting merge game! Explore Mergedom where you merge countless tools to upgrade them so you can use them to repair, renovate, customize, and design your home.

Meet new people, unlock new rooms, reveal secret objects.

MERGEDOM FEATURES:
MERGE OBJECTS - Explore numerous objects, solve challenging puzzles and complete hundreds of tasks by merging for useful tools. You never know what comes next when you combine them!

RENOVATE - Fulfill orders, earn coins and design vacant homes. Your next room is waiting for you!

EASY TO PLAY - This merging game is so simple that anyone can get into it!

SATISFYING GAMEPLAY - Relax with well designed combinations and endless fun.

GREAT TIME FILLER - Features simple, highly addictive gameplay. You can pause the game and continue whenever you want.

Download now to kick off your journey and find out the amazing world of Mergedom!
